Room.Name: Arena Events and Information Center
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large office where the description of the daily Arena events are posted and a small map of the large arena is available.
Room.LongDescription: The Oceancrest Central Arena is not a place for the weak-natured, weak- stomached or weak-of-heart. It is divided into three major Arenas: the Central Arena, where players engage in hand-to-hand combat with various gladiators and other fighters for victory and glory. The map shows the various degrees of difficulty in the arena. The Pits of Doom are holding pens for large dragons. These should not be tampered with without extreme care. Dragons enjoy gladiators for lunch or at least a light snack before dinner. The Game Arena is the largest of them all which combines skill and strategy to defeat the Wizard of Kaldais.
